amendment.description: To prohibit certain forms of proprietary trading, and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4115 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 4115 proposed by Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 3789. (consideration: CR S3961) To prohibit certain forms of proprietary trading, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4115 proposed by Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 3789.
